Rooms.Name: Start Room
Rooms.Description: You are in a small, dimly lit room. Thereâ€™s a door to the north.

Rooms.Name: Hall
Rooms.Description: You are in a grand hallway with doors to the east, west, and south.

Rooms.Name: Library
Rooms.Description: The library is filled with ancient books. A stick rests on a high shelf.

Rooms.Name: Kitchen
Rooms.Description: The kitchen smells of stale food. There's a locked door to the cellar to the south.

RoomActions.message: You unlock the door to the cellar.

Rooms.Name: garden
Rooms.Description: The garden has an apple tree at its center. There is something hanging from a branch.

RoomActions.message: Using the stick, you retrieve a golden ring from the tree.
